website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and eye-catching option that can add a splash of color to your backyard décor.
pros: This brightly colored outdoor day bed is manufactured using durable, weather-resistant materials
The contemporary design enhances the appeal of your backyard living space while the large cushions provide comfort
As with other models of this design, it features a retractable canopy
cons: Like some of the other outdoor daybeds, this model may be a little difficult to assemble for some people

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comfortable chair for two
customer_reviews.text: I purchased last summer and it held up very well over the winter. A little tough to assemble but worth the end result! Beautiful bold cushions and pillows!
customer_reviews.author: The Heart of Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Hard to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It's Beautiful I love it.. But be warned... Assembly is straight out of the deepest depths of the underworld!! A lot of the holes just wouldn't line up no matter what we tried. Took about 3hrs to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Boriken De Caribeñas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece so much. It is very comfortable as well. It was a pain to put together. The pre drilled holes did not line up well so it was difficult to get together. But finally after many hours we got it together and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color, comfortable cushions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this daybed for my parents to replace their old pieces for the vacation home. The whole family love it very much! It is very stylish. The blue color matched the pool nicely. It also paired very well with the side table that we bought last year. The cushions are soft and comfortable. The retractable shade opens easily. Everyone enjoys laying on it for some sun with the face not been tanned. The assembly does take some effort but it well worth it. The shipping is lightning fast too.
customer_reviews.author: CCCBYY

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sophisticated.
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up box 2 of 2 from UPS (1 of 2 was mailed) and assembled most of it by myself. Aside from the gas pump that holds the canopy up, assembly wasn't too bad but did take a few hours. I'm excited to use it outdoors and see how it holds up in 100° weather. The color combo of blue and brown rattan pair nicely. Customer service was professional and attentive, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Merm

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality outdoor daybed
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great price and easy to put together. Packaging was exceptional! Would recommend to anyone looking for an outdoor daybed with canopy . Thickness of Cushions makes them comfortable Material and color wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: miss48

customer_reviews.title: So happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We love this daybed. Color is beautiful. Two person install helps. It is very beautiful and enjoy lounging on it looking up to sky. Our pups join us on it. The canopy feature is nice for shade if needed but we're loving the sun. Can be taken apart for storage in winter month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the porch
customer_reviews.text: The cushions could be thicker, would also Like it better if cushions could be joined together so they don’t separate.
customer_reviews.author: cmsowner

customer_reviews.title: Great style but less comfort
customer_reviews.text: Color and style are great. We get so many compliments on it. It isn't very comfortable to relax on. It's ok if you want to sit up but doesn't offer much head room. Overall we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blanks

customer_reviews.title: Great seat outdoors but needs more cushion
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair but it needs more cushion for the seat and the pillows are quite small against the back they should have had bigger pillows maybe 24x24. Also was pleasantly surprised when the color of the wicker was much darker than the photo... looks much better darker. The assembly was a little tough but once it was done it was the new instant favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was a great item . It was delivered a few days early from expected date . It was packaged well and had Easy to follow instructions. Color was spot on and was a perfect addition to our pool area . I did have a question about the product and I was able to get it answered from customer service right away. They responded to my request promptly and their customer service was excellent . I will definetely buy more products from M&W.
customer_reviews.author: francisco marin

customer_reviews.title: Great daybed
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was simple though it did take several hours. I was able to do it by myself (female, 37). I think it looks great and is comfortable. As other reviewers noted, the cushions are thin. But they’re not terrible. I do wish the cushions could zip together but I’m not sure any of the other daybeds like this do that and they are all far more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly except for the canopy which took a few minutes to get it attached. Exactly as pictured. I bought a round table cover to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and Confortable
customer_reviews.text: this was the best investment ever for an outdoor furniture category, i absolutely Love this bed ,its super comfortable, looks stylish .. we are getting more than our moneys worth already .. was a bit tedious to install cos of the wicker, so be patience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love the finished product, we get a lot of compliments on it, looks great! Putting it together was a pain though.
customer_reviews.author: ashley sahadi

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived 20 days early, which I was extremely happy with. Instructions say it takes 2 people to assemble, but I assembled it by myself, anyone with basic tool knowledge shouldn't have issues. We love it!! Very comfy and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beware of missing items
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I had hoped. Padding is thing. We only received two pillows not four. So far, seller hasn’t responded about that. Descent deal for the money but not impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great by my pool in my backyard. For the price it is a great deal. It's just the right size but it does not take up too much room but can hold two people in comfort and if you split it four people.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Candido

customer_reviews.title: Cushions could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't easy to assemble and thought the cushions would be thicker. When you lay down you could feel the iron rods. If the cushions would be thicker I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: This appeared used. The wicker was very cheap and looked flimsy. The color is great!
customer_reviews.text: Never took it out of both boxes it appeared returned by previous customer.
customer_reviews.author: 1/2 pint

customer_reviews.title: Use clamps
customer_reviews.text: No problem assembling helps if you have some clamps took me about 2.5 hours working solo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water or fade resistant
customer_reviews.text: One of the pillows discolored after a month and the pillows are not water resistant
customer_reviews.author: E Sainato

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble! The pieces on the canopy were rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: M&W Patio Furniture Round Outdoor Daybed with Retractable Canopy and Soft Cushions, PE Wicker Rattan Sectional Sofa Set for Lawn Garden Backyard Pool
feature_bullets: 【CONTEMPORARY STYLE】This stylish outdoor round sofa with retractable canopy, is an ideal leisure and holiday companion to relax and enjoy yourself, and is also an indispensable part of your party, perfect for patio, balcony, deck, backyard porch and pool

【RETRACTABLE CANOPY】The retractable sunshade canopy with high quality telescopic pull rod, is more convenient to open and close, protects you from the burning sun. Bring you comfortable experience with thick padded cushions and throw pillows
【MULTIPLE OCCASIONS】The seats can be separated and combined freely, with the gorgeous turquoise cover and special antiquated-like wicker, this daybed is especially suitable for party and family use

【DURABLE AND STURDY】Crafted with stable steel frame, all-weather PE rattan and water-resistant polyester fabric, can well stand for both test of time and high temperature, durable for year-round use but light for move. Load capacity of each seat: up to 250 lbs.

【TEAM ASSEMBLY REQUIRED】Overall dimensions: 70" Dia. x 56.7" H ( canopy up). Easy to assemble with all hardware required, and our professional service team is always ready to solve any problem, worry-free purchase guaranteed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
